code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FinanceInfo=_ref=>{let{id,onChange,data,dataName,name}=_ref;const[listup,setListup]=useState(false);const list={dataList:dataName};const navigate=useNavigate();console.log("dataname",dataName);console.log("financeDetail",list.dataList);console.log(listup);const onClick=e=>{const values=e.textContent;navigate("".concat(name,"/").concat(values));};useEffect(()=>{if(!dataName){return;}setListup(true);},[dataName]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"financeInfo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"formBox",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{id:"myForm",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{form:"myForm",id:id,onChange:onChange,name:id,children:data.map((v,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:v.name,children:v.name},id+i))})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"list",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"listBox",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"list_title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\uAE08\uC735\uC0C1\uD488"})}),listup&&list.dataList.map((v,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{onClick:e=>onClick(e.target),children:[v.title,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:v.prdtnm}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"finDate",style:{"color":"#000"},children:v.typenm}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"finDate",children:v.start})]})},'list'+i))]})})})]});};export default FinanceInfo;
